author: felixk
msg: - Add generation of site and technical reports switch by profile site-reports
- Change Jenkins CI configuration to use m3 (JFI, but not in commit included)

author: fdmanana
msg: Replicator: better behaviour on checkpoint failure
Replicator processes now terminate immediately after a checkpoint failure.
Checkpoint error detection and logging is improved as well.
Issue identified by, and initial patch provided by Randall. Thanks.

author: igalic
msg: That was a bit too much commit, for a simple typo fix.
